name: Home R.I.P.airs
description:
How to play the game / Controls: 

  1. General
    1. Home R.I.P.airs is a game about, well, repairs and protecting your home from spooky forces. 
  2. Controls 
    1. Move: Arrow keys
    2. Jump: Space bar
    3. Fix: X 
    4. Salt: C 
  3. Instructions
    1. Fix the spooky problems that pop up around the house every 10 seconds by tapping at it with your hammer the correct number of times.
    2. Higher severity problems (marked with warning signs) drain your house health faster!
    3. Keep the salt level at a maximum at your door or else a ghost might come to slow you down!
    4. Fill the salt meter to the max to make any ghosts disappear. 
    5. Make it through the night without your house and sanity crumbling down.
